hardwareLicense.title: What license is your project's hardware licensed under?
hardwareLicense.requiredErrorMessage: You must select a license. If your license is not listed, select "Other"
hardwareLicense.instructions: If your license is not listed, choose "Other"

softwareLicense.title: What license is your project's software licensed under? Select "No software" if your project doesn't use software
softwareLicense.requiredErrorMessage: You must select a license. If your license is not listed, select "Other". If your project doesn't use software, select "No software".
softwareLicense.instructions: If your license is not listed, choose "Other"

documentationLicense.title: What license is your project's documentation licensed under?
documentationLicense.requiredErrorMessage: You must select a license. If your license is not listed, select "Other"
documentationLicense.instructions: If your license is not listed, choose "Other"

noCommercialRestriction.title: The project is licensed in a way to allow for modifications and derivative works without commercial restriction.
